verses.1: Topa aw, kote tunga thupiangte hong phawk in. Hong en inla, ka maizumna uh hong mu in.
verses.2: Ka neihsa teng uh gamdang miteʼ khut sungah tung mangkhin a, ka inn sung uh ah gamdang mite teng ta uh hi.
verses.3: Ka pate uh gal in hong thahsak khin a, ka nute uh meigong suak khin uh hi.
verses.4: Ka tui dawn tawm ding uh lei ding kul ta a, ka sing cihtawm ding uh lei ding kul ta hi.
verses.5: Kalaoh van pua le la van pua bangin nakpi takin a hong kihawl gawpgawp hi. Gim mahmah hi napi tawlngak nading hun a hong kipia kei hi.
verses.6: Ka nuntak theih nadingun Assiria le Egypt-te kiangah an ngen dingin ka pai uh hi.
verses.7: Ka pu ka pate un mawhna a bawl manun a si khin uh hi. Amauteʼ mawhna kote in ka thuak uh hi.
verses.8: Silate sangin a zahpih huai zaw mite in kote hong uk tazen uh a, amauteʼ khut sung panin kuamah in a hong hon khia zo kei hi.
verses.9: Gam sung khempeuh ah misuamte dim ahih manin, luangkham zen mahin an zong dingin ka pai uh hi.
verses.10: Gilkial luat manin cisa-in ka nattun uh a, ka pumpi uh mei-am sa a bang hi.
verses.11: Zion mual le Judah gam sung khempeuh ah ka zite uh le ka nungakte uh hong kibuansak hi.
verses.12: Makaite khempeuh hong kikhailupsak a, ka puteekte uh a hong kithusimsak kei hi.
verses.13: Tangvalte sila bangin aana tawh an kigawisak a, naupangnote sing kitomsakin a lelh pipi uh a kipuasak hi.
verses.14: Puteekte khuapi kongpi ah tu nawn lo uh a, khangnote in la a sa nawn kei uh hi.
verses.15: Lungnopna khempeuh bei mang khinta a, lungdamna khempeuh lungkhamna a suakta hi.
verses.16: Kisaktheih nading bangmah om nawn lo a, mawh ihih manin gimna a thuak ihi hi.
verses.17: I lungsim mahmah cina a, i khitui luangte in khua hong musak thei kei hi.
verses.18: Zion mual gamdai ta a, kinusia khin ahih manin se-alte a kawi vak ta hi.
verses.19: Ahih hangin Topa aw, nang na hih leh a tawntungin kumpi na hi a, hun tawp dongin na uk paisuak ding hi.
verses.20: Bang hangin sau veipi hong pampaih na hi hiam? Kote hong phawkkik nawn lo takpi ding na hi hiam?
verses.21: Topa aw, kote hong kaikhawmkik in! Hong kaikhawmkik in! A beisa sau veipi lai mah bangin hong thaksuaksakkik in.
verses.22: Kote hong nial tawntung takpi ding na hi hiam? Na hehna in ciangtan hun nei thei lo ding ahi hiam?
